title: [Skin Concept]: Dark Star Mordekaiser
body:
(Disclaimer: I sadly have no Artwork for this skin concept on hand to share. This will be text only.)
[Edit: **I am in no way, shape or form asking for Mordekaiser to be buffed.** This is just a simple concept for a skin & a champion shouldn't have to be buffed just to recieve stuff like this, regardless of who that champion is.]
-----------

So with the recent additions to the Dark Star Line (Jhin, Shaco & Karma) & Mordekaiser recieving a complete relaunch, I asked myself "what if Mordekaiser joined that line-up?". 

With his new lore (being an ancient spirit of a warrior king that simply refused to fade away into oblivion) and simply how cool his ultimate would look with a Darkstar Theme, I began piecing this skin together & I'd figure I'd share what I have.
------------------
[Basic Rundown of Skin Lore, W.I.P]:
A Constellation that simply refused to be absorbed by the Darkstar, Mordekaiser became a Malevolent Cosmic Entity hellbent on consuming the cosmos. Gaining more & more power with each Galaxy Consumed.
-----------
[Passive: Darkness Rise] 
Galaxy VFX with Darkstar Colors (Similar to Aurelion's Q, only difference would be the color scheme.)

[Q: Obliterate]
The impact zone would have a dark purplish hue to it. Not much changed here.

[W: Indestructible]
First cast: Morde's chest would be surrounded with a Purple/Black energy cloud.
Second cast: The energy cloud would be absorbed into his chest.

[E: Deaths Grasp]
A Claw similar to the one seen in Darkstar Cho'Gaths Joke Animation (where Cho high fives a disembodied hand) sprouts out of tbe ground, pulling enemies towards Mordekaiser.

[R: Death Realm]
Morde points his Mace at an enemy, bringing them to the edge of the cosmos, just outside of the Darkstar's Gravitational pull. The arena would have a Galactic theme & you might be able to place the Darkstar itself somewhere in the backround.
--------------
This is all I have jotted down at the moment so far. I feel that this could very well be a decent 1350 skin for Mordekaiser if they chose to create a new skin for him in the future.

Thoughts?

[EDIT]
As of January 15th 2020, Riot has announced that Mordekaiser will be recieving a skin and they showed off some Official Concept art of Dark Star Mordekaiser.
